raw_comment:
What do you notice?
1. It seems that soccer is the least diverse sport, racially.
What do you wonder?
1. What exactly have major sports leagues done to make their organizations more diverse?
What impact does this have on you and your community?
This graph remindS me that we are still very unequal when it comes to employment.
What's going on in this graph? Write a catchy headline that captures the graph's main idea.
When Intent Leaves Us With Inequality.
ace_sentences: Soccer seems to be the least diverse sport racially.
I wonder what major sports leagues have done to make their organizations more diverse.
This graph reminds me that we are still very unequal in employment.
The headline is: When intent leaves us with inequality.
